messages.title: A strong, local voice for Westminster North
messages.content: On Thursday 8 June you will choose your local MP. I hope I can count on your vote. I’m known for being a hard-working, independent-minded, accessible MP who always puts the people of Westminster North first.

messages.title: Standing up against a hard Brexit
messages.content: I’m standing up against a ‘hard’ Brexit. Almost 70% of Westminster residents voted to stay in the EU - one of the highest remain votes in the country. But whether they voted remain or leave, no-one voted to become worse off. The Conservative Party want to pursue a divisive and destructive Brexit: out of the Single Market and Customs Union and are prepared to leave the EU with no deal at all. This carries huge risks for our jobs and prosperity.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Fight to protect our vital services
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Protect schools, the police, NHS and social care against the damage done by the Tories’ spending cuts
End to luxury flats for rich investors rather than residents
Work with the Mayor of London to improve transport and tackle poor air quality

mentions.tacticalSituation: Only a vote for me, the Labour candidate, can beat the Conservatives here.

issues.brexitEurope: I’m standing up against a ‘hard’ Brexit. Almost 70% of Westminster residents voted to stay in the EU - one of the highest remain votes in the country. The Conservative Party want to pursue a divisive and destructive Brexit.
issues.education: fight to protect our vital services - schools
issues.environment: work with the Mayor of London to improve transport and the environment - we must tackle poor air quality.
issues.health: fight to protect our vital services - the NHS and social care
issues.lawCrime: fight to protect our vital services - the police
issues.transport: work with the Mayor of London to improve transport

community.content: campaign for the decent, affordable homes we so desperately need - not just more luxury flats for rich investors rather than residents

leaflet.personalStatement: I have lived in Westminster North for 35 years. It is my home. Our area needs a Labour MP to stand up for our communities and all of our residents after years of a Conservative government and a Conservative council.

endorsements.endorsement: Karen is a great champion for Westminster North. I want her back in Parliament fighting for her constituents and protecting London against a damaging hard Brexit.
